partA_dishNames.description_en: Medium fatty tuna with perfect balance of fat and lean.
partA_dishNames.description_zh: 肥瘦适中的金枪鱼中腩。
partA_dishNames.description_en_nodic: Nakatoro (medium fatty tuna) is a perfect balance of moderate fat and lean meat.
partA_dishNames.description_zh_nodic: 中等脂肪的金枪鱼，在适度脂肪和瘦肉之间达到完美平衡。

partA_dishNames.description_en: Fatty mackerel cured in vinegar with refreshing acidity.
partA_dishNames.description_zh: 醋腌油脂丰富的青花鱼，酸味清爽。
partA_dishNames.description_zh_nodic: 醋渍肥美鲭鱼。清爽的酸味。

partA_dishNames.description_en: Gunkan sushi topped generously with salmon roe.
partA_dishNames.description_en_nodic: Gunkanmaki is a gunkan roll topped with a generous amount of petit salmon roe.
partA_dishNames.description_zh_nodic: Gunkanmaki 配有大量小鲑鱼子。

partA_dishNames.description_en: Softly simmered conger eel with sweet glaze.
partA_dishNames.description_zh: 柔软煮制的星鳗，甜酱是点睛之笔。
partA_dishNames.description_en_nodic: Softly cooked conger eel. The sweet claws are the deciding factor.
partA_dishNames.description_zh_nodic: 软熟的海鳗甜美的爪子是决定性因素。

partA_dishNames.description_zh: 北海道产肉质松软的远东多线鱼。

partA_dishNames.description_en: Fatty yellowtail glazed with sweet teriyaki sauce.
partA_dishNames.description_zh: 油脂丰富的鰤鱼配甜辣照烧酱。
partA_dishNames.description_en_nodic: Fatty yellowtail with sweet and spicy teriyaki sauce.
partA_dishNames.description_zh_nodic: 肥美的黄鱼配上甜辣的照烧酱汁。

partA_dishNames.description_en: Crispy fried tofu served in warm dashi broth.
partA_dishNames.description_zh: 外酥里嫩的炸豆腐配温热高汤。
partA_dishNames.description_en_nodic: Crispy fried tofu soaked in warm broth.

partA_dishNames.description_en: Kyushu-style chicken and root vegetable stew.
partA_dishNames.description_zh: 鸡肉和根菜慢炖的九州乡土料理。
partA_dishNames.name_en_nodic: chicken stew with taro, carrot, burdock, etc.
partA_dishNames.description_en_nodic: A local Kyushu dish of slow-cooked chicken and root vegetables.
partA_dishNames.description_zh_nodic: 慢炖鸡肉和根菜的九州地方菜肴。

partA_dishNames.description_en: Chicken and soft egg over rice with dashi flavor.
partA_dishNames.description_zh: 鸡肉和半熟蛋盖饭，出汁风味浓郁。
partA_dishNames.description_en_nodic: Chicken and egg in a bowl. Dashi (Japanese soup stock) is very effective.
partA_dishNames.description_zh_nodic: 鸡肉鸡蛋盖饭。汤汁非常有效。

partA_dishNames.description_en: Crispy fried sweet potato glazed with sweet syrup.
partA_dishNames.description_zh: 油炸红薯裹满甜蜜糖浆。
partA_dishNames.description_en_nodic: Crispy fried sweet potatoes filled with sweet honey.
partA_dishNames.description_zh_nodic: 酥脆的炸红薯配上大量的甜蜂蜜。

partB_descriptions.description_en: Crispy fried tofu served in warm dashi broth.
partB_descriptions.description_zh: 外酥里嫩的炸豆腐配温热高汤。
partB_descriptions.description_en_nodic: Crispy fried tofu soaked in warm broth.

partB_descriptions.description_en: Silky steamed egg custard with shrimp and ginkgo.
partB_descriptions.description_zh: 滑嫩的蒸蛋，配有虾和银杏。
partB_descriptions.description_en_nodic: Smooth steamed egg. With shrimp and gingko nuts.
partB_descriptions.description_zh_nodic: 光滑的蒸蛋。配虾和银杏果。

partB_descriptions.description_en: Sweet and savory stew with beef and potatoes. Home-style.
partB_descriptions.description_zh: 牛肉土豆甜辣炖煮，家常味道。
partB_descriptions.description_en_nodic: Beef and potatoes stewed in sweet and spicy sauce. Taste of home.
partB_descriptions.description_zh_nodic: 甜辣酱炖牛肉和土豆。家乡的味道

partB_descriptions.description_en: Fried chicken with sweet vinegar and rich tartar sauce.
partB_descriptions.description_zh: 炸鸡配甜醋和浓郁塔塔酱。
partB_descriptions.name_en_nodic: fried chicken with vinegar and tartar sauce
partB_descriptions.description_en_nodic: Deep fried chicken with lots of sweet and sour and tartar sauce.
partB_descriptions.description_zh_nodic: 炸鸡配大量糖醋和塔塔酱。

partB_descriptions.description_en: Chicken and soft egg over rice with dashi flavor.
partB_descriptions.description_zh: 鸡肉和半熟蛋盖饭，出汁风味浓郁。
partB_descriptions.description_en_nodic: Chicken and egg in a bowl. Dashi (Japanese soup stock) is very effective.
partB_descriptions.description_zh_nodic: 鸡肉鸡蛋盖饭。汤汁非常有效。

partC_allergens.description_en: Crispy fried tofu served in warm dashi broth.
partC_allergens.description_zh: 外酥里嫩的炸豆腐配温热高汤。
partC_allergens.description_en_nodic: Crispy fried tofu soaked in warm broth.

partC_allergens.description_en: Silky steamed egg custard with shrimp and ginkgo.
partC_allergens.description_zh: 滑嫩的蒸蛋，配有虾和银杏。
partC_allergens.description_en_nodic: Smooth steamed egg. With shrimp and gingko nuts.
partC_allergens.description_zh_nodic: 光滑的蒸蛋。配虾和银杏果。

partC_allergens.description_en_nodic: Tempura of 2 prawns and seasonal vegetables.
partC_allergens.description_zh_nodic: 天妇罗配两只大虾和时令蔬菜。

partC_allergens.description_en: Large shrimp in crispy batter with tartar sauce.
partC_allergens.description_zh: 大虾裹酥脆面衣，配塔塔酱。
partC_allergens.description_en_nodic: Large shrimp in crispy batter. Comes with tartar sauce.
partC_allergens.description_zh_nodic: 大虾裹上酥脆的面糊。配塔塔酱。

partC_allergens.description_en: Rich cream sauce with crispy bacon.
partC_allergens.description_en_nodic: Rich cream sauce and crispy bacon.
partC_allergens.description_zh_nodic: 浓郁的奶油酱和香脆的培根
